actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883, to eliminate the requirement of apportionment of appointments to the competitive civil service.

summary.text: Eliminates the requirement of apportionment of appointments to the competitive civil service among the several States, territories, and the District of Columbia on the basis of population. (Repeals 5 U.S.C. 632)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883, to eliminate the requirement of apportionment of appointments to the competitive civil service.
